did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
University of Virginia Bibliographical Society Financial Records
1953-1958
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 2 cubic feet (ca. 2500 items).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
Univeristy of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia Bibliographical Society Financial Records, Accession #RG-24/2/4.761, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer to the library on 16 December 1976.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Financial records of the Bibliographical Society of the University of Virginia including a "letters of transmittal" file, and a file of "paid bills."

did.unittitle: Bibliographical Society Account, National Bank and Trust Co. Statements 1953 July-1954 Sep
